testsuite.name: Тесты с методом GET

testcase.name: Запрос ID книги с буквенным значением

testsuite.system-out:
Request method: GET Request URI: http://localhost:5000/api/books/1 Proxy: Request params: Query params: Form params: Path params: Headers: Accept=*/* Content-Type=application/json Cookies: Multiparts: Body: 2023-03-22 13:01:04 [INFO ] helpers.RequestHelper:sendRequest:47 Response body: { "book": { "author": "Роберт Мартин", "id": 1, "isElectronicBook": false, "name": "Чистый код", "year": 1998 } } Request method: GET Request URI: http://localhost:5000/api/books/1555 Proxy: Request params: Query params: Form params: Path params: Headers: Accept=*/* Content-Type=application/json Cookies: Multiparts: Body: 2023-03-22 13:01:04 [INFO ] helpers.RequestHelper:sendRequest:47 Response body: { "error": "Book with id 1555 not found" } Request method: GET Request URI: http://localhost:5000/api/books/%3D%3D Proxy: Request params: Query params: Form params: Path params: Headers: Accept=*/* Content-Type=application/json Cookies: Multiparts: Body: 2023-03-22 13:01:05 [INFO ] helpers.RequestHelper:sendRequest:47 Response body: 404 Not Found
